value: Towards the Tomb of the Fallen Knight
english: Towards the Tomb of the Fallen Knight

value: Destroy all enemies and rescue the Trader Turtle
english: Destroy all enemies and rescue the Trader Turtle

value: Destroy all enemies and salvage your Stash
english: Destroy all enemies and salvage your Stash

value: Help Kiki to raid the Tomb of the Fallen Knight
english: Help Kiki to raid the Tomb of the Fallen Knight

value: Investigate what the little fox is up to
english: Investigate what the little fox is up to

value: Help Kiki to raid the Sepulcher
english: Help Kiki to raid the Sepulcher

value: Help Kiki to loot the Lost Opal
english: Help Kiki to loot the Lost Opal

value: Help Kiki to raid the Crypt
english: Help Kiki to raid the Crypt

value: Help Kiki to raid the Tomb of the Eternal Queen
english: Help Kiki to raid the Tomb of the Eternal Queen

value: A transmission from the Astroloot Team
english: A transmission from the Astroloot Team

value: Oh, thank the stars! I've been stranded here for days.
english: Oh, thank the stars! I've been stranded here for days.

value: Those Haunters have me on the hook. I don't dare to move.
english: Those Haunters have me on the hook. I don't dare to move.

value: Help me out, and you'll get first pick once my shop's back online.
english: Help me out, and you'll get first pick once my shop's back online.

value: Things are getting strange this deep into the sector...
english: Things are getting strange this deep into the sector...

value: I can feel it - my stolen eggs must be nearby.
english: I can feel it - my stolen eggs must be nearby.

value: With your help, I know we will find every last one.
english: With your help, I know we will find every last one.

value: Oh, and rumor has it... there's a giant egg somewhere out here. A very giant egg.
english: Oh, and rumor has it... there's a giant egg somewhere out here. A very giant egg.

value: You're not gonna believe what I just sniffed out!
english: You're not gonna believe what I just sniffed out!

value: Only the most legendary, most dazzling, most pink treasure in the entire sector!
english: Only the most legendary, most dazzling, most pink treasure in the entire sector!

value: It's real, and it's being hoarded by the last of Nihalor's creepy old Guardians.
english: It's real, and it's being hoarded by the last of Nihalor's creepy old Guardians.

value: You shoot the bad things, I grab the treasure. Just like old times!
english: You shoot the bad things, I grab the treasure. Just like old times!

value: No one has ever ventured this deep into the sector.
english: No one has ever ventured this deep into the sector.

value: The path to the right leads to Drak'Veth.
english: The path to the right leads to Drak'Veth.

value: A thief, who stole something of great worth from me long ago.
english: A thief, who stole something of great worth from me long ago.

value: Alone, I stand no chance against him. Will you help me get it back?
english: Alone, I stand no chance against him. Will you help me get it back?

value: Straight ahead lies the lair of King Gruvak.
english: Straight ahead lies the lair of King Gruvak.

value: I'm not sure you're ready for that kind of challenge just yet.
english: I'm not sure you're ready for that kind of challenge just yet.

value: The path to the left leads to the Lost Opal, which I desperately need to have.
english: The path to the left leads to the Lost Opal, which I desperately need to have.

value: Join me, if you want to loot with me on a side quest once more!
english: Join me, if you want to loot with me on a side quest once more!

value: You think you're special because you scrapped that deranged mutt and his flea-bitten pup?
english: You think you're special because you scrapped that deranged mutt and his flea-bitten pup?

value: My throne is forged from the cores of a thousand fallen ships like yours.
english: My throne is forged from the cores of a thousand fallen ships like yours.

value: Come, and on behalf of Nihalor, I will end you.
english: Come, and on behalf of Nihalor, I will end you.

value: The stars whispered you would come.
english: The stars whispered you would come.

value: I was the last to swear the oath. Not for glory...
english: I was the last to swear the oath. Not for glory...

value: Strike true, if you must. But know this:
english: Strike true, if you must. But know this:

value: You crushed my spawnlings - shattered their promise before they could feed.
english: You crushed my spawnlings - shattered their promise before they could feed.

value: But I remember you. The slow one. The meddler cloaked in kindness.
english: But I remember you. The slow one. The meddler cloaked in kindness.

value: Carlo... you should never have come back to the nest.
english: Carlo... you should never have come back to the nest.

value: I am the first womb. The ancient rot. The mother of mouths.
english: I am the first womb. The ancient rot. The mother of mouths.

value: And you... you soft, warm things. You will slide down my throats gladly.
english: And you... you soft, warm things. You will slide down my throats gladly.

value: Light! A friendly face! Wait... you! Oh no.
english: Light! A friendly face! Wait... you! Oh no.

value: That wasn't me. That was Koko - my evil twin sister!
english: That wasn't me. That was Koko - my evil twin sister!

value: You didn't notice? The eye-patch? The mad eye underneath it?
english: You didn't notice? The eye-patch? The mad eye underneath it?

value: I mean, come on! I'd never wear something so hideously out of fashion.
english: I mean, come on! I'd never wear something so hideously out of fashion.

value: At first she wanted the Pink Diamond. Of course she did. But then...
english: At first she wanted the Pink Diamond. Of course she did. But then...

value: She saw your crafting manual. And that changed everything.
english: She saw your crafting manual. And that changed everything.

value: She said, and I quote - 'Why waste time on one shiny rock when I can make anything I want?'
english: She said, and I quote - 'Why waste time on one shiny rock when I can make anything I want?'

value: So she ditched me in that pod, grabbed your manual, and ran.
english: So she ditched me in that pod, grabbed your manual, and ran.

value: She'll try to use it for shiny and stupid and probably explode half a planet doing it.
english: She'll try to use it for shiny and stupid and probably explode half a planet doing it.

value: We have to stop her. Before she turns your manual into a glitter cannon of doom.
english: We have to stop her. Before she turns your manual into a glitter cannon of doom.

value: This part of the sector? Buried in ancient treasures.
english: This part of the sector? Buried in ancient treasures.

value: Could be junk. Could be shiny. Could be cursed. Isn't that exciting!?
english: Could be junk. Could be shiny. Could be cursed. Isn't that exciting!?

value: Guess what I found! Another one of those shiny, locked-up Loot Boxes!
english: Guess what I found! Another one of those shiny, locked-up Loot Boxes!

value: No credits needed. No microtransactions. No 'limited-time offer' popups!
english: No credits needed. No microtransactions. No 'limited-time offer' popups!

value: This is the real loot. Only way to get one is to come treasure-hunting with me!
english: This is the real loot. Only way to get one is to come treasure-hunting with me!

value: Four stood watch in silence. Four bore the weight of eternal vigil.
english: Four stood watch in silence. Four bore the weight of eternal vigil.

value: Their strength must flow through you. Only then shall Nihalor's seal break.
english: Their strength must flow through you. Only then shall Nihalor's seal break.

value: Descend, bearer of all boons - or be unmade.
english: Descend, bearer of all boons - or be unmade.

value: Well, look what I stumbled upon!
english: Well, look what I stumbled upon!

value: Another set of tombs just begging to be explored!
english: Another set of tombs just begging to be explored!

value: You can keep all gear we find. Me? I'm just here for the sparkles!
english: You can keep all gear we find. Me? I'm just here for the sparkles!

value: Huh, we found the Tomb of the Fallen Knight!
english: Huh, we found the Tomb of the Fallen Knight!

value: Rumor has it, the Knight was buried with a pretty powerful weapon.
english: Rumor has it, the Knight was buried with a pretty powerful weapon.

value: I'm sure it's dull and dusty by now, so you should take it.
english: I'm sure it's dull and dusty by now, so you should take it.

value: Watch out - there are some absolute madlads guarding this place.
english: Watch out - there are some absolute madlads guarding this place.

value: I'm lucky to have you as my sidekick for this mission. Ready?
english: I'm lucky to have you as my sidekick for this mission. Ready?

value: Hmm... this place feels kinda weird... Like, extra weird.
english: Hmm... this place feels kinda weird... Like, extra weird.

value: Don't stay in the corrupted area too long, okay?
english: Don't stay in the corrupted area too long, okay?

value: Uh-oh... it looks like the treasure moved even deeper into the corrupted area!
english: Uh-oh... it looks like the treasure moved even deeper into the corrupted area!

value: Looks like the shiny stuff is hiding way inside the bad zone now.
english: Looks like the shiny stuff is hiding way inside the bad zone now.

value: Why do my treasures always have to be that hard to get?
english: Why do my treasures always have to be that hard to get?

value: Whoa… the Lost Opal. So shiny. So dangerous. So totally worth it!
english: Whoa… the Lost Opal. So shiny. So dangerous. So totally worth it!

value: Let's grab it before the corruption does!
english: Let's grab it before the corruption does!

value: Hey, you look like someone who can handle a challenge!
english: Hey, you look like someone who can handle a challenge!

value: I've found an ancient treasure hidden in this asteroid tomb.
english: I've found an ancient treasure hidden in this asteroid tomb.

value: But it's cursed and guarded by some... let's just say, not-so-friendly creatures.
english: But it's cursed and guarded by some... let's just say, not-so-friendly creatures.

value: I could use a partner in this raid.\nAre you in?
english: I could use a partner in this raid.\nAre you in?

value: Looks like those architects thought they could outsmart us with fake tombs.
english: Looks like those architects thought they could outsmart us with fake tombs.

value: Little do they know, I raid everything anyway, even if it is absolute garbage.
english: Little do they know, I raid everything anyway, even if it is absolute garbage.

value: Let's get in there and make sure we don't miss a thing. Ready?
english: Let's get in there and make sure we don't miss a thing. Ready?

value: Another tomb? These guys really went all out to keep people away.
english: Another tomb? These guys really went all out to keep people away.

value: Let's keep moving! I feel my treasure's gotta be close.
english: Let's keep moving! I feel my treasure's gotta be close.

value: Don't overthink - it is always the last tomb anyways.
english: Don't overthink - it is always the last tomb anyways.

value: Let's just clear all out and snag my treasure!
english: Let's just clear all out and snag my treasure!

value: Ohhh, I can't wait to loot this place! My shiny treasures!
english: Ohhh, I can't wait to loot this place! My shiny treasures!

value: You can have the Wheel of Fortune. One should be around here somewhere.
english: You can have the Wheel of Fortune. One should be around here somewhere.

value: I already have one in my collection, so I don't absolutely need another one.
english: I already have one in my collection, so I don't absolutely need another one.

value: And the Wheel of Fortune will come in handy on your adventure!
english: And the Wheel of Fortune will come in handy on your adventure!

value: Ugh, there's a lot of radioactivity coming from this Tomb.
english: Ugh, there's a lot of radioactivity coming from this Tomb.

value: Damn, I really hope the treasure is not in here.
english: Damn, I really hope the treasure is not in here.

value: I don't want to decontaminate my loot for the next hundred years.
english: I don't want to decontaminate my loot for the next hundred years.

value: Be extra careful here, alright? Let's crack this Tomb open!
english: Be extra careful here, alright? Let's crack this Tomb open!

value: Alright, we're here for the Voltron Key.
english: Alright, we're here for the Voltron Key.

value: Grab it, and we're one step closer to the final treasure. Let's move!
english: Grab it, and we're one step closer to the final treasure. Let's move!

value: Oh, don't give me that look. I borrowed the manual.
english: Oh, don't give me that look. I borrowed the manual.

value: You weren't using it properly. So limited... so predictable.
english: You weren't using it properly. So limited... so predictable.

value: Kiki never had the vision. But me? I'm gonna rewrite the laws of loot.
english: Kiki never had the vision. But me? I'm gonna rewrite the laws of loot.

value: And you? You're just here to lose one last time.
english: And you? You're just here to lose one last time.

value: If you want your manual back...\nCome take it.
english: If you want your manual back...\nCome take it.

value: Oh wow... this must be it. The big one. The egg from the rumors.
english: Oh wow... this must be it. The big one. The egg from the rumors.

value: It's not one of mine. This shell... it's twisted. Corrupted.
english: It's not one of mine. This shell... it's twisted. Corrupted.

value: Oh dear! Another Egg-Bane! And it's about to hatch!
english: Oh dear! Another Egg-Bane! And it's about to hatch!

value: We have to destroy it - and its broodmother. This ends now!
english: We have to destroy it - and its broodmother. This ends now!

value: Oh, what big eyes I have, you ask?
english: Oh, what big eyes I have, you ask?

value: All the better to see just how outmatched you are. You will die like all the others.
english: All the better to see just how outmatched you are. You will die like all the others.

value: What big ears I have, eh?
english: What big ears I have, eh?

value: All the better to hear your last breath.
english: All the better to hear your last breath.

value: What big teeth I have, you ask?
english: What big teeth I have, you ask?

value: Stories change, but teeth stay sharp. Care to find out just how sharp?
english: Stories change, but teeth stay sharp. Care to find out just how sharp?

value: I am the Moon King, keeper of the night and guardian of the celestial order.
english: I am the Moon King, keeper of the night and guardian of the celestial order.

value: So... the one who took my son's life dares to stand before me.
english: So... the one who took my son's life dares to stand before me.

value: I swear upon the stars and shadows, I will make you suffer as I do now.
english: I swear upon the stars and shadows, I will make you suffer as I do now.

value: Ohh... this looks like a trap.
english: Ohh... this looks like a trap.

value: Definitely a trap. No doubt about it.
english: Definitely a trap. No doubt about it.

value: But what if it isn't? Just a little peek. What's the worst that could -
english: But what if it isn't? Just a little peek. What's the worst that could -

value: Surely it can't be a trap every time -
english: Surely it can't be a trap every time -

value: Outrageous! If anyone gets to kidnap Kiki, it's me!
english: Outrageous! If anyone gets to kidnap Kiki, it's me!

value: That dusty old book hoarder Matilda has been chasing the Book of Eternal Wisdom for centuries.
english: That dusty old book hoarder Matilda has been chasing the Book of Eternal Wisdom for centuries.

value: Naturally, Kiki found it first. And now? Matilda locked her up, trying to squeeze out where she hid it.
english: Naturally, Kiki found it first. And now? Matilda locked her up, trying to squeeze out where she hid it.

value: Here, I stole the key to her prison cell. Come on, Kiki needs our help!
english: Here, I stole the key to her prison cell. Come on, Kiki needs our help!

value: Koko...? Is that really you? After all these years?
english: Koko...? Is that really you? After all these years?

value: Get me outta here! Let's show Matilda it was a terrible idea to mess with Kiki and Koko. Oh, and with you.
english: Get me outta here! Let's show Matilda it was a terrible idea to mess with Kiki and Koko. Oh, and with you.

value: Hey hey! I'm hosting a racing tournament in this sector!
english: Hey hey! I'm hosting a racing tournament in this sector!

value: Koko's racing too, you have to join us!
english: Koko's racing too, you have to join us!

value: Whoever finishes first keeps all Loot Boxes collected along the way!
english: Whoever finishes first keeps all Loot Boxes collected along the way!

comment: Monster level describes the level of enemies that spawn in this mission
Reward this mission grants to the player
In the tutorial, the player must follow a trail of power-ups
In case a mission was already completed, but can be played again
For missions that are not part of the main campaign

value:
You defeated {0},
but this victory marks only the beginning of an epic adventure.

Continue your build in the full {1}Early Access{2} version
and restore peace to the Astroloot Sector.
english:
You defeated {0},
but this victory marks only the beginning of an epic adventure.

Continue your build in the full {1}Early Access{2} version
and restore peace to the Astroloot Sector.

value: Oh no... your crafting manual? I hope you get it back soon. Things just aren't the same without it.
english: Oh no... your crafting manual? I hope you get it back soon. Things just aren't the same without it.

value: You did it! I'm so happy that you got it back.
english: You did it! I'm so happy that you got it back.
